<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Scholar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5568) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You gain the [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5117) feat. If you would automatically gain that feat (from your background or the alchemist class, for example), you instead gain a different 1st-level Crafting skill feat. Add an additional common 1st-level [alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=528) formula to your formula book when you take this feat. Each time you gain a level beyond 1st, add one common alchemical formula of that level to your formula book.
